contentGranularity.description: How content is distributed across tiles

modes.one-article-per-tile: Each article gets one reading tile (all sections + guiding Qs) + one quiz tile (DEFAULT)
modes.one-section-per-tile: Each section gets its own tile with one guiding question
modes.full-text-per-tile: Each tile contains full text + all guiding questions + quiz

tileLayout.description: Tiles are automatically generated based on story data. Pattern determines path through tiles.

availablePatterns.linear-horizontal: Fill row by row, left to right
availablePatterns.linear-vertical: Fill column by column, top to bottom

gridAlignment.description: CSS values for aligning the grid overlay with background image

gameFlow.description: If true, tiles unlock one at a time. If false, all tiles available
gameFlow.passThresholdDescription: Minimum accuracy % required to unblur the tile. If not met, tile stays blurred but next tile still unlocks.

scoringSettings.description: auto = sum of section questions + quiz questions, or specify a number

scoreMessages.message: Perfect score! You're a reading superstar! üåü
Nice try! Let's read it again! üìö

readingTimerSettings.description: Countdown timer before guiding questions appear, giving students time to read

ui.fontFamily: 'Comic Sans MS', 'Arial Rounded MT Bold', cursive, sans-serif

dataSource.description: external = load from QTI JSON file
dataSource.description_autoLoadMode: fill-grid = automatically load as many articles as needed to fill all 16 tiles, manual = only load articles specified in articleSequence
dataSource.description_maxArticles: Maximum number of articles to load (prevents loading all 131 articles)
